#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 10000001
#define MOD 1000000007
#define ll long long
vector<ll> ans;
int prime[10000001];
ll mulmod(ll a,ll b,ll c){
	ll res=1;
	while(b){
		if(b&1){
			res=(res*a)%c;
		}
		a=(a*a)%c;
		b>>=1;
	}
	return res;
}
void sieve(){	
	int i,j;
	for(i=4;i*i<MAX;i+=2)
		prime[i]=1;
	for(i=3;i*i<MAX;i+=2){
		if(!prime[i]){
			for(j=2;j*i<MAX;j++){
				prime[j*i]=1;
			}
		}
	}
	ans.push_back(4);
	for(i=3;i<MAX;i+=2)
		if(!prime[i])
			ans.push_back(mulmod(i,i,MOD));
}
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	sieve();
	while(t--){
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<ans[n-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
